attributes.action: Abolish Parliament, Politicians and Political Parties with Direct Consultation Instead
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Abolition of Parliament,
 Politicians and Political Parties
 will benefit Direct Democracy through
 Referendums and Public Surveys .

 We call for the Abolition of the
 above Mentioned with Power returned
 to the Crown and Direct 
 Consultationship to take the Place of
 the Parliamentary Oligarchy
